‚ÄúTrain wreck, Plane wreck, or Car wreck. That's what you get. Tried both the shatter & flower, both were realllly good. First it wrecks you going up, then this shit wrecks you on the down-side. Not a bad smoke, give it a try and hear the clickety clack of them wheels baby!‚Äù

‚ÄúTrainwreck is, to me, the perfect Sativa strain, and is my current go-to for long training runs.  I'm a crohns patient and would not be capable of running even short distances without MMJ.  Trainwreck has the unique ability to not only moderate my normal crohns pain but also provide the extra drive to push myself.  I keep a stash of this one on hand for my 10 mile or longer runs, and it never dissappoints.

‚ÄúScent: 9.4 - Strong citrus / sweet scent

Taste: 9 - Taste the same as it smells! Sweet smoke and a citrus taste when you exhale.

Look: 8.8 - Chubby tight cony bud with a lot of trichomes.

Effect: 9.2 - Put you in your bubble after the first hit without putting you to sleep, big head high.

Final verdict: 9.1 - One of my favorite hybrid strain!‚Äù

‚ÄúAfter smoking a couple bowls of this all I can say is, they don't call it Trainwreck for nothing! All your thoughts start colliding with eachother until all you're left with is a cluster-fuck of information overload. . .

At least that's my experience with it.‚Äù

‚ÄúPicked up a gram of this stuff from stoneman concentrates which tested at 86% Thc, 0.30 CBD, 1.36% CBN. 

  The high comes in instanly with this strain and hits very hard, keeps you in a giggly mood, would 100% recommend to anyone.‚Äù

‚ÄúPicked up a gram of some good looking Trainwreck and I must say as Sativa fan this strain is up my alley.

It gave me a quick euphoria feeling that then turned into a deep relaxation, giggly, happy type of high. 

It legit smells like pine out the little bag I got from LES in Vallejo. 

When I woke up the next morning and started my wake and bake session it gave me euphoria and lots of ENERGY! lol I'm still thinking ...‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat dativa chillin cerebral thought provoking smells amazing‚Äù

‚ÄúYup. This one hit me pretty good. Happy and uplifted for sure. Could totally space out if I felt like it or just stay In The now and chit chatting . Definitely prolly shouldn't have smoke this one before bedtime... wife doesn't like how sativa keeps me jostling in bed..... üòÆ‚Äù

‚ÄúThis quick burning strain has you feeling all types of good. I smoked a blunt of it solo and it had me feeling on cloud 9. Instead rushes of euphoria and creativity adds to this strains punch to the face once in hits.‚Äù
‚ÄúUpon exhale, this strain hits you with a wave of euphoria and energy which is great for going on an adventure/hike. Not a very focused high so maybe not perfect for work but still does the job.‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat day smoke... uplifting bad mood beater‚Äù
‚Äúreally smooth‚Äù
‚Äúvery potent earthy lemon smell. very beautiful and the feeling is definitely felt pretty quick too.‚Äù

‚ÄúTrainwreck is right! Totally scatterbrained, but uplifted and euphoric as well. Had energy but was disorganised, so got nothing at all done, despite the efforts. Enjoyed it.  2nd dose after 2 hours was additive, more euphoria, more elation, more scatterbrained. NO PAIN‚Äù
‚Äú1 of the top 5 sativa dominates, great for taking away pains in the daytime.‚Äù
‚ÄúUplifting feel, increased energy and creativity but very heady.  Not fantastic if you have high paranoia or anxiety but manageable.‚Äù
‚ÄúAWESOME! excellent pain control and a wonderful boost of ever so lovely energy. Great both body and head.‚Äù

‚ÄúI have the absolute pleasure to say that this was the first flower I have ever smoked when I started and I'm so glad my noobie lungs where blessed with a great strain. If you're in a dispensary and wondering if you should grab this strain you really should. Doesn't knock you on your ass or give you a shit tone of energy. It's nice an balanced between those 2.‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat dativa chillin cerebral thought provoking smells amazing‚Äù

‚Äúthis strain, hits in like a MOTHERFUCKER GIANT, but also very sincere and lovely precious at the same time, sitting here in deep space with somewhat typing this message from a different dimension, I‚Äôm not sure , Connor- MI‚Äù
‚ÄúAWESOME! excellent pain control and a wonderful boost of ever so lovely energy. Great both body and head.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain is so good. Hits me so hard and fast like a freight train. And makes me want to drift off to sleep‚Äù
‚ÄúA fantasic energizing strain.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is the O.G. of north Cali herb. Getting its name from how it hits, pain and stress don‚Äôt stand a chance. Deep pine with lovely citrus notes. Beautiful, even burn, is great for blunts but even better in the pipe. Hard to find but worth every breath, cough, and penny.‚Äù

‚ÄúI'm on the night train,and i'm ready to crash and burn!!! I smoked the Trainwreck flower years ago,and the concentrate is exactly how i remember the flower...It tastes good,knocks you on your ass,and makes you cough like hell.On the palate I get lemon / pine,with a pungent flavor,and some earthy notes.Always a good strain for stress and pain.‚Äù

‚ÄúOk so I‚Äôve had a couple of bad experiences with other strains , or it doesn‚Äôt give me the type of release I needed. My friend brought this over we started smoking and I haven‚Äôt felt this good in so long . I feel at peace with the world rn. All of my problems and stress errs just vanished . I acknowledge they are there but I‚Äôm at peace with them. This feels like a warm hug on a bad day guys . 10/10 my new strain.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis strain is so good. Hits me so hard and fast like a freight train. And makes me want to drift off to sleep‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is one strain you want to be able to say you've smoked.

Get it!‚Äù

I acknowledge they are there but I‚Äôm at peace with them. This feels like a warm hug on a bad day guys . 10/10 my new strain.‚Äù
‚ÄúIt was kind of a harsh smoke for me. I love the strong sativa effects. It motivates me to get things done and it totally kills my hangovers. ;)‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat dativa chillin cerebral thought provoking smells amazing‚Äù

‚ÄúTrainwreck - A classic strain which provides a great head high while also relieving pain and aches. Good for depression and stress and the high is not too racy so my anxiety does not flare up. Also tastes great - classic pungent, earthy, lemony flavours. 

I definitely feel relaxed and am involuntarily tapping along to the beat of my accompanying music.

A pretty great strain.‚Äù
‚ÄúEnergetic Strain‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat day smoke... uplifting bad mood beater‚Äù
‚ÄúThis strain is so good. Hits me so hard and fast like a freight train. And makes me want to drift off to sleep‚Äù
‚ÄúEnergetic Strain‚Äù

‚ÄúSo... every time i get this strain, i seem to have the same dry mouth issue... it's really bad. It also tastes awful. It always seems to be harsh, although that could just be the harvest. 

Also? Uncontrollable munchies lol!

The downsides, however, do not outweigh the good effects it has.

Being sativa, this strain definitely helps you focus. To the point i don't feel i need my vyvanse! That being said, though.. don...‚Äù
‚ÄúEnticing and uplifting; surpassing gentle and soft, just right and forgiving with energy before sedation.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain hits all the right areas for marijuana,  it will give you a euphoric and creative buzz as well as relieve stress and muscle fatigue all day.  after 20 min then it will creep up and trainwreck you.  
I think it may be bettet in small doses.  the bud vapes the smoothest 10/10 and as a pungent, earthy, lemon aroma.  
overall great hybrid strain for my add
Does anyone know the thc/cbd ratio and levels?
great ...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is one strain you want to be able to say you've smoked.

Get it!‚Äù

‚ÄúWow. Love this strain.
Warm body high and total euphoric upswing.
Highly recommend.‚Äù

It legit smells like pine out the little bag I got from LES in Vallejo. 

When I woke up the next morning and started my wake and bake session it gave me euphoria and lots of ENERGY! lol I'm still thinking ...‚Äù
‚ÄúOne of my favorites. A strong, lasting high that made me feel happy and energetic. This one is perfect for a wake n' bake with a nice coffee.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is one strain you want to be able to say you've smoked.

Get it!‚Äù

‚ÄúAmazing strain of high Sativa-dominant weed. Produces very, very full smoke from dense nugs with a nice citrus smell and taste, indicate of sativas. The high is very heady and very productive. It also creeps up on you. You will not be fully high until about 5 minutes after the blunt/bowl is done, but when it hits you, it hits you like a trainwreck. ;)‚Äù

‚ÄúHelped a great deal with studying (took the tiniest of hits), made the tedious enjoyable, made focusing much, much easier. Slight headache, asthma was benefically affected (vaporized it). Overall, relaxed, focused, happy.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis strain is so good. Hits me so hard and fast like a freight train. And makes me want to drift off to sleep‚Äù
‚ÄúSmoked this and rearranged all the furniture. it looks much better now! nice, functional but potent‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is a great daytime strain.  This is actually one of my favorites because it helps my ADD without elevating my anxiety.  It alleviates my anxiety, depression, and my back pain.  I also really love the scent of this.‚Äù

‚ÄúTrainwreck is right! Totally scatterbrained, but uplifted and euphoric as well. Had energy but was disorganised, so got nothing at all done, despite the efforts. Enjoyed it.  2nd dose after 2 hours was additive, more euphoria, more elation, more scatterbrained. NO PAIN‚Äù

‚ÄúThis potent strain is a has a hard-hitting high which is a long-lasting euphoria feeling. I used to have a train wreck plant years ago and it was very low maintenance. So I can say they are pretty beginner friendly to grow.‚Äù

‚ÄúVery potent that packs a huge punch. I remember it was so hard for me to wake up in the mornings lol. But I‚Äôd still smoke Trainweck any day of the week regardless. It‚Äôs a great strain and I really like it.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis is the happiest I‚Äôve ever been high. I feel confident creative and energetic, and I didn‚Äôt get the munchies too bad, but I did have a good meal during my high.‚Äù

‚ÄúDon't be fooled by the dogma of the name. Trainwreck is more along the lines of an industrial grade extended sauna session. Out of the volcano the indica presence in this strain is melting me. But just enough sativa inside this gooey high to stabilize my mood and get me ready for the day.‚Äù

‚ÄúI loved this stuff. Lasts forever!! I smoked this shit around 4:30 and the effects were barley wearing off around 10. Left me energetic and happy, made everything super vibrant. Great strain to hang out with friends. Although with me it didn't hit me that hard.‚Äù

‚ÄúBy far my favorite strain to date. I‚Äôve finally found a hybrid that relieves pain and gives you a great cerebral high. If you‚Äôre looking for best of both worlds get your hands on some Trainwreck!‚Äù
‚ÄúSmooth hitting and aromatic. Cerebral high as well as tingles throughout my body. I want to talk and dance. This is a good thing.‚Äù
‚ÄúGood stuff!! Nice head high, not too lazy, focused high!‚Äù
‚ÄúStressed out? This is a great strain for stress and anxiety. go from down n the dumps to happy go lucky in a few hits! Trainwreck gives me motivation to get up and clean the house too!‚Äù

‚ÄúThis strain was conceived in Fort Bragg, CA in the early 80s. I know, because I was there. I got it's name from train wreck that happened in Buffalo, NY. The train operator was excused of being high. You can thank Ross Vinson for the original seeds. We gave them to some of the best growers out there.‚Äù

‚ÄúI was hesitant to try after reading about it producing a powerful sativa buzz, considering I try to stick to indica dominant strains to help alleviate anxiety and PTSD as well as insomnia.

But this strain is now a favorite as far as sativa dominant strains go. Strong and potent. Lasts me longer than most bud.‚Äù
‚ÄúTalk about the perfect wake and bake combination... she‚Äôll have you stuck or running around chasing your own tail hahaha but if you‚Äôre like me then you love the chase!!!‚Äù

‚ÄúI just picked up an eighth of this stuff. I got home, packed the bong & took two rips. Very quickly, I noticed a feeling of euphoria, within about five or ten minutes. This strain is very nice for joint pain as well as anxiety. The perfect strain to just curl up & read a book with.  The high lasts a good two hours (peaking at about the 45 minute mark) and it burns very nicely, especially in a bong.‚Äù

‚ÄúOne of my top 5. Smoking this strain saved my life and help me change my perspective on the world. Hard to find sometimes even in WA state. Happy hunting it's well worth the effort to get your hands on this miraculous strain!‚Äù

‚ÄúOne of the best strains I have tried EVER! I am not someone who claims to have tried 235,987 different strains. But just enough to know this is an All-Time Great! Each bud is generously stuffed with Kief! Cheers and I hope this bud brings you to the places it has brought me.‚Äù

‚Äú0 harshness
Nicest smoke yet!‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is a very great strain. The high lasts a while... and I‚Äôm an every day smoker. Smoked a bowl and I still feel it after an hour. You just know it‚Äôs gonna hit you good once you‚Äôre packing it. There‚Äôs nothing else I can say. 5/5 strain. Probably lands in one of my tops to smoke.‚Äù

‚ÄúTHIS IS THE BOMB! MY FAVORITE STRAIN!!

I've always been kinda a sativa kinda guy. so when I first smoked that Trainwreck, my buddy River and I didn't know what we were in for. nice pine flavor, goes down smooth. really bad aftertaste though. we took a few rips off a bubbler and waited about 10 minutes and let me tell you, the wait is WORTH IT!  It definitely creeps up on you, starting by taking control of the body i...‚Äù
‚ÄúIt was kind of a harsh smoke for me. I love the strong sativa effects. It motivates me to get things done and it totally kills my hangovers. ;)‚Äù
‚ÄúHits you hard then it‚Äôs a slow and nice ride down to being sober‚Äù
‚ÄúVery good for thinking. Take it by yourself in a quiet space and let the universe talk to you. Taste was Earthy.‚Äù

‚ÄúI acquired and grew this original Trainwreck strain in Arcata, CA from  1997 to 2012.  45 days for the budding  cycle.  Lime green, and looks 100% sativa.  The branches could be bent into a knot with nice sized resinous buds.  With Trainwreck you can keep smoking and keep getting higher and higher, you don't usually plateau.  Freshly screened hash from this stain retains the buds flavor.  Interestingly with this stra...‚Äù

‚ÄúWake-baked a .5g joint. Tasted like spicy herbal tea and green grassy pine tree. This is a great rainy-day, wanna play strain. Started with a bang of a cerebral high, a whoosh of pain relief, and a zing of creativity. Light exercise could be great with Trainwreck. Heavier doses may make you feel more lethargic. Left me with a tiny headache after. Strain 19 of 100.‚Äù

‚Äú0 harshness
Nicest smoke yet!‚Äù
‚ÄúIt's one of the best I ever had. Smooth easy hits, happy and euphoric feeling. P.S currently high.‚Äù

‚ÄúGood strain, but not a nice taste.  All the effects of this strain were on point and made for a great experience.  I just really couldn't get past the strong pine taste (almost like a burnt spicy buffalo flavour in my vaporizer). 3 stars for the taste, 4 for the effects.‚Äù

‚Äúreally great strain (only a few hits needed-3 for me) for anxiety and stress when you don't really want to be stoned, but you need help. I hate taking xanax and this has been a good alternative. also just as great (smoked until I literally fell asleep) for getting fucked up and needing to sleep. and a great creativity strain when you need some good vibes to get ya going. overall just good for a lot of things and I lo...‚Äù

‚ÄúAfter ripping Trainwreck from a bong, it hit me instantly propelling me into a massive high full of happiness and pure focus.‚Äù

‚ÄúTrainwreck is everything.  Nothing else I've tried has given me a consistent, predictable, positive high without the sativa paranoia I usually experience.  It's my number 1 go to because it often makes unbearable things (mainly cleaning...) enjoyable and can easily land me in a giggle fit.  Everything I look for in a daytime strain and more!‚Äù
